Package geometries

Class Plane

java.lang.Object
geometries.Plane
All Implemented Interfaces:
Geometry, Intersectable
public class Plane
extends java.lang.Object
implements Geometry
Class Plane is 2D basic object in geometry which represented by two vectors which come from the same point and have different directions (together reflecting the basic 2D object.) defined by a point and a normal vector

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors 
    Constructor Description
    Plane​(Point3D P1, Point3D P2, Point3D P3)
    Plane constructor must be defined here by three vectors, one of them represent the beginning point, and the two others represent the normal vector
    Plane​(Point3D p, Vector normal)
    Plane constructor must be defined here by normal vector and point, by normal vector we can represent two vectors which creates the 2D plane object, by the point we can represent the location

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    boolean equals​(java.lang.Object obj)
    equals method is for compare between two objects with checking if they have the same details which relevant to the class in this method we compare details of class Plane, which represent by the vector normal and a 3D point.
    java.util.List<Point3D> findIntersections​(Ray ray)
    findIntersections method will group all the points which the ray intersect with the class Plane

    getter of the point represent the location of class Plane

    • Plane

      public Plane​(Point3D P1, Point3D P2, Point3D P3)

      Parameters:
      P1 - use it for the location
      P2 - vector represent one dimension
      P3 - vector represent other dimension

    • Plane

      public Plane​(Point3D p, Vector normal)
      Plane constructor must be defined here by normal vector and point, by normal vector we can represent two vectors which creates the 2D plane object, by the point we can represent the location
      Parameters:
      p - represent the location
      normal - represent the two dimensions
